org.apache.jena.fuseki.jetty

Class JettyFuseki

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jena.fuseki.jetty.JettyFuseki

  • public class JettyFuseki
extends Object
    Standalone server, not run as a WAR file. Used in testing and development. SPARQLServer is the Jena server instance which wraps/utilizes Server. This class provides immediate access to the AbstractLifeCycle.start() and AbstractLifeCycle.stop() commands as well as obtaining instances of the server and server configuration. Finally we can obtain instances of JettyServerConfig.
